recipes.label: Compose a Brilliant Song
recipes.startdescription: I could compose a song based on the glimpes of brighter times and greater truths.

recipes.label: Compose a Fiery Song
recipes.startdescription: I could compose a song based on the moment of heat and force that destroys the old for the new.

recipes.label: Compose a Furious Song
recipes.startdescription: I could compose a song based on dangerous challenges, and the will to conquer them.

recipes.label: Compose a Morose Song
recipes.startdescription: I could compose a song based on that quiet mourning one does when they cannot feel the sun.

recipes.label: Compose a Joyous Song
recipes.startdescription: I could compose a song based on all that moves and all that gets us moving.

recipes.label: Compose a Seductive Song
recipes.startdescription: I could compose a song based on the feelings that one is not sure they should permit themselves to feel.

recipes.label: Compose a Song of Folly
recipes.startdescription: I could compose based on the patterns obscured beneath the chaotic and beyond the strange.

recipes.label: Compose an Intuitive Song
recipes.startdescription: I could compose a song based on those painful revelations that are felt deeply but rarely understood.

recipes.label: Compose a Song?
recipes.startdescription: Do I wish to Compose a Song? If I supply this tune with an Inspiration that matches in Aspect, I can comepose a Motifs charged with that particular quintessence.
